attributes.action: change the law on no confidnce votes, so that when a no confidnce vote is called it goes to the britsh people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when a no confidnce vote is called the britsh people should decide whether they have confidnce in the goverment, the britsh people have to live with the govements mess they should have the right to decide if they have confidnce in the goverment.
